voicePlay.title: Play Steel Darts using your voice
voicePlay.slogan: Stay in flow and improve your game.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work in noisy environments?
faqs.answer: No. VoicePlay was developed for quiet to silent environments, especially for practicing. Noisy environments with multiple people speaking simultaneously can lead to instability.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work without an internet connection?
What happens if an account is shared?
faqs.answer: An account is tied to the account holder. Sharing it can lead to the account being suspended.

faqs.question: Have questions about billing or need assistance with payment?
faqs.answer: For billing inquiries and assistance with payments, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1227611762719854652/1227616575415255051).

faqs.question: Experiencing technical issues or want to report a bug?
faqs.answer: For technical support and bug reporting, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1227611762719854652/1227616480519127124).

footer.slogan: Perfect your game while DartSense handles counting.
